Chile: A violent earthquake and subsequent tsunami strike Valdivia and Chiloé.
India:
Marathas under Bajirao I defeat the Mughal Empire in the Battle of Delhi (1737)
Marathas defeat a combined army of the Mughal Empire, Nizam of Hyderabad, Nawab of Awadh and Nawabs of Bhopal in the Battle of Bhopal
Russia: Russo-Turkish War (1735–1739): Austria joined the war on the Russian side.
Sweden: Swedish language Theater of Bollhuset founded
